column4: I am trying to install UB 9.04 on my nVidia Raid 5.  I have installed dmraid in the live disk and done a dmraid -r and it sees my drives and says its a supported raid type; however I dont think they are "joined" when I go into gparted it claims my raid 5 is 250GB when in reality I have 4x250GB.  Any ideas?
hi, have you tried the other install method... like ubuntu-server... you can set up the raid there
nope just on the Desktop-x64 right now
experiment with that install... more control
